name: Boobs 'em up
description:
You are playing as a prostitutes at the beginning of her career. To start doing this business and make money you should get your place on the street. The better place, means more clients and more money. To get such place, you have to fight with dozens of other prostitutes who want to work on this street too. You will not back down, you are a naked amazon and are ready to kill everybody on your way.

Key features of Boobs 'em up game:
- sexy fights on the streets
- bad naked babes
- very realistic body physics
- different weapons, like knife, baseball bat, gun
- easy controls


You and other prostitutes are not hiding their bodies. The are naked, because they want to show their sexy bodies to the potential clients, but it does not prevent them from fighting. Do you want to participate in this battle? The download the game and have fun!
